fields.name: ThrottleTimeMs
fields.about: The duration in milliseconds for which the request was throttled due to a quota violation, or zero if the request did not violate any quota.

fields.name: Brokers
fields.about: Each broker in the response.

fields.name: NodeId
fields.about: The broker ID.

fields.name: Host
fields.about: The broker hostname.

fields.name: Port
fields.about: The broker port.

fields.name: Rack
fields.about: The rack of the broker, or null if it has not been assigned to a rack.

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.about: The cluster ID that responding broker belongs to.

fields.name: ControllerId
fields.about: The ID of the controller broker.

fields.name: Topics
fields.about: Each topic in the response.

fields.name: ErrorCode
fields.about: The topic error, or 0 if there was no error.

fields.name: Name
fields.about: The topic name.

fields.name: IsInternal
fields.about: True if the topic is internal.

fields.name: Partitions
fields.about: Each partition in the topic.

fields.name: ErrorCode
fields.about: The partition error, or 0 if there was no error.

fields.name: PartitionIndex
fields.about: The partition index.

fields.name: LeaderId
fields.about: The ID of the leader broker.

fields.name: LeaderEpoch
fields.about: The leader epoch of this partition.

fields.name: ReplicaNodes
fields.about: The set of all nodes that host this partition.

fields.name: IsrNodes
fields.about: The set of nodes that are in sync with the leader for this partition.

fields.name: OfflineReplicas
fields.about: The set of offline replicas of this partition.

fields.name: TopicAuthorizedOperations
fields.about: 32-bit bitfield to represent authorized operations for this topic.

fields.name: ClusterAuthorizedOperations
fields.about: 32-bit bitfield to represent authorized operations for this cluster.
